categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Glich was a Rebel transport encountered by Maarek Stele on his first sortie at Outpost D-34.

Glich is not specifically described in TIE Fighter: The Official Strategy Guide, but mentioned only by name under mission goals for the first mission of the Hoth Aftermath campaign. This craft will appear only on the hardest difficulty setting, and should be destroyed to complete one of two bonus goals.
